fs
  • Reference

List files in a directory

List files in a directory

dir_list(path = ".", all = FALSE, recursive = FALSE, type = "any",
  regexp = NULL, glob = NULL, ...)

dir_walk(path = ".", fun, all = FALSE, recursive = FALSE, type = "any")

dir_info(path = ".", all = FALSE, recursive = FALSE, type = "any",
  regexp = NULL, glob = NULL, ...)

Arguments

path

A character vector of paths.
all

If TRUE hidden files are also returned.
recursive

Should directories be listed recursively? the filenames.
type

File type(s) to return, one or more of "any", "file", "directory", "symlink", "FIFO", "socket", "character_device" or "block_device".
glob, regexp

Either a file glob (e.g. *.csv) or a regular expression (e.g. \.csv$) passed on to grep to filter paths.
...

Additional arguments passed to grep.
fun

A function, taking one parameter, the current path entry.

Functions

  • dir_walk: Walk along a directory, calling f for each entry in the directory.

  • dir_info: A shortcut for the combination of file_info(dir_list()).

Examples

dir_list(R.home("share/R"))
#> /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/share/R/REMOVE.R
#> /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/share/R/examples-footer.R
#> /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/share/R/examples-header.R
#> /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/share/R/nspackloader.R
#> /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/share/R/tests-startup.R

link_create(system.file(package = "base"), "...")

dir_list("...", recursive = TRUE, glob = "*.R")
#> .../demo/error.catching.R .../demo/is.things.R      .../demo/recursion.R      
#> .../demo/scoping.R        
dir_walk(system.file(), str)
#>  chr "/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/library/base/CITATION"
#>  chr "/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/library/base/DESCRIPTION"
#>  chr "/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/library/base/INDEX"
#>  chr "/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/library/base/Meta"
#>  chr "/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/library/base/R"
#>  chr "/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/library/base/demo"
#>  chr "/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/library/base/help"
#>  chr "/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Resources/library/base/html"
dir_info("...")
#> # A tibble: 8 x 18
#>   path            type          size permissio… modification_time   user  group
#>   <fs::filename>  <fctr>   <fs::byt> <fs::perm> <dttm>              <chr> <chr>
#> 1 .../CITATION    file           956 rw-rw-r--  2017-12-06 21:16:12 root  admin
#> 2 .../DESCRIPTION file           286 rw-rw-r--  2017-12-06 21:16:12 root  admin
#> 3 .../INDEX       file         23.2K rw-rw-r--  2017-12-06 21:16:12 root  admin
#> 4 .../Meta        directo…       272 rwxrwxr-x  2017-12-06 21:16:12 root  admin
#> 5 .../R           directo…       204 rwxrwxr-x  2017-12-06 21:16:12 root  admin
#> 6 .../demo        directo…       204 rwxrwxr-x  2017-12-06 21:16:12 root  admin
#> 7 .../help        directo…       238 rwxrwxr-x  2017-12-06 21:16:12 root  admin
#> 8 .../html        directo…       136 rwxrwxr-x  2017-12-06 21:16:12 root  admin
#> # ... with 11 more variables: device_id <dbl>, hard_links <dbl>,
#> #   special_device_id <dbl>, inode <dbl>, block_size <dbl>, blocks <dbl>, flags
#> #   <int>, generation <dbl>, access_time <dttm>, creation_time <dttm>,
#> #   birth_time <dttm>
link_delete("...")
